title: Kan Lalpa Pathian Isua kan thian tha ber hnenah
lyrics:
Kan Lalpa Pathian Isua, kan thian tha ber hnenah
Ama malsawmna leh hliahkhuhna chang tura,
Rin neia kan inkhawmin, tawngtai hun tak a ni;
Chak lo tan chakna a ni, ringhlel tan nghehna nen.

Biak hun lawmawm hi, biak hun lawmawm hi,
Chak lo tan chakna a ni, ringhlel tan nghehna nen.

Chhandamtu'n ngilnei taka pek tuma min hovin,
Ama ta tak kan duh tinreng kan dil theih laiin;
Kan chakkhai tinreng hrilhin, inlan theuh tur a ni,
A hnena dil hun a ni, pek tumin a ngai thin.

Mangang leh lungngai taka kan awm khawm lai pawhin,
Kan Pa hmaah kan kun ang a, lungchhe takin;
Kan chakkhai kan dil tinreng min la hlawhtlintir ang,
Min thlamuan fo tawh ang a, min hruai fo thin ang a.

He biak hun lawmawm taka kan rinhlelh tawpp lo chuan,
Dil ila kan ngen chu min hlawhtlintir ngei ang,
"Rin antam mu fang khat ang in neih chuan tih theih loh,
Eng mah reng in nei lo vang, " tiin tanpui min tiam.
